At Perfect Glasses we provide an excellent range of high quality prescription glasses and sunglasses. You can literally choose from a collection of over 1000 pairs of glasses for men and women. And yes, buying prescription glasses online is easy. Every optician in the UK is required to give you a copy of your prescription when you go for your eye test. Once you have this, simply choose a pair of prescription glasses from our site, enter your prescription or click it using your smartphone and email it to us. Once you have placed the order for your new glasses online, you can expect to receive them within 7 working days!

It’s simple. Each pair of prescription glasses that we supply is covered by a ‘100% No Quibble Guarantee’. This means that if for any reasons you are not happy with your pair of prescription glasses, designer glasses or prescription sunglasses, you get a FREE Exchange or Full Refund. So go ahead & pick your perfect pair of prescription glasses online today!
